query:
ALTER TABLE photos
ADD COLUMN floorPlanId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN floorPlanX DECIMAL(10, 4) NULL COMMENT 'X coordinate on floor plan',
ADD COLUMN floorPlanY DECIMAL(10, 4) NULL COMMENT 'Y coordinate on floor plan',
ADD FOREIGN KEY (floorPlanId) REFERENCES floor_plans(id) ON DELETE SET NULL;
